variants.Description in input context: c.103T>C (p.W35R) in PINK1 associated with Parkinson's disease

Material used.Material Name: Postmortem brain tissue from Parkinson's patients
Material used.Description: Protein extracts were obtained from postmortem brain tissue of Parkinson's patients and controls.

Readout description.Result Description: Reduced PINK1 protein levels observed in patient-derived tissue compared to controls.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was analyzed in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type PINK1 cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Student's t-test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: PINK1 expression â‰¥ 85% of control levels
